description.plain:
“Antidote” is Orion Sun’s breakout single from her debut independent album, a collection of fleeting moments and daydreams, garnering over 18 million plays on Spotify alone.

Orion tells a modern summer love story induced by the freedom of having a car in the city, along with the turmoil of lacking bedroom A.C., excessive expectations of strangers, and experiencing life with a loved one.

song.embed_content: Read “Antidote” by Orion Sun on Genius
song.title: Antidote

album.name: a collection of fleeting moments and daydreams

body.plain:
“Antidote” is Orion Sun’s breakout single from her debut independent album, a collection of fleeting moments and daydreams, garnering over 18 million plays on Spotify alone.

Orion tells a modern summer love story induced by the freedom of having a car in the city, along with the turmoil of lacking bedroom A.C., excessive expectations of strangers, and experiencing life with a loved one.

annotations:
Just wanna be your friend
 And go downtown in the evenin’
 Sharin’ secrets, I promise I’ll keep them

This is an example of not over complicating a relationship. It can be so simple and beautiful yet we sometimes over think everything. Just being there for one another is enough sometimes and the rest will fall into place. Beauty in simplicity
But I rock the boat like Aaliyah

Orion Sun nods to late R&B artist Aaliyah by referencing her song “Rock the Boat”

Orion Sun once again compares herself to another well-known R&B artist to point out her musical influences as well as to praise her own growing talent
I don’t play the keys like Alicia

This line is a play on the name of the heavily influential and well-known R&B artist Alicia Keys

Orion Sun compares her own musicality to Keys' familiarity and extreme talent with the piano. These lines give a personal look into her musical influences.
Mr. Softee is a well known ice cream truck chain in the northeastern U.S. states. They are particularly known for their soft serve cones (hence the name!)
An east coast favorite, now with over 1,000 locations worldwide! These donuts are extremely sweet :)
Read receipts on Apple’s iPhone show someone when a text has been read or ‘seen’

search_results.title: Valentine
search_results.lyrics:
Valentine Lyrics[Verse]
The first time you told me that you loved me
My heart skipped a beat
And I fell from my feet towards the ground
But I never touched down
You had the Cherokee
Drove down to Brigantine
Wearin' your favorite jeans
Soft pretzels and ice cream
What a dream, what a dream
But life has its own plans
Fuck happiness and romance
Here's a bad time and
There's no silver linin'
Don't know where to find it
So I'll see you in another life
Another place, another time
Where everything I say is fucking right
And I'm your valentineYou might also like1Embed

description.plain: Valentine is the 6th track on Tiffany Majette’s (aka Orion Sun) first studio album, a collection of fleeting moments and daydreams. The song is about her longing for an ex-lover, bringing back painful memories of the time they spent together and fleeting moments that will last in her mind forever. Orion Sun wishes for a reality where their relationship never ended, and she could finally be happy again.

song.embed_content: Read “Valentine” by Orion Sun on Genius
song.title: Valentine

album.name: a collection of fleeting moments and daydreams

body.plain: Valentine is the 6th track on Tiffany Majette’s (aka Orion Sun) first studio album, a collection of fleeting moments and daydreams. The song is about her longing for an ex-lover, bringing back painful memories of the time they spent together and fleeting moments that will last in her mind forever. Orion Sun wishes for a reality where their relationship never ended, and she could finally be happy again.

annotations:
What a dream, what a dream
 But life has its own plans
 Fuck happiness and romance
 Here’s a bad time and
 There’s no silver linin’
 Don’t know where to find it

She is stating how, while one would like their dreams to come true, reality is often disappointing and leaves a person bitter and resentful of their fantasies because they will never achieve them. This resentfulness bleeds into a person’s overall perception of their life and makes it hard to see the positive, or “silver lining”, because even the best things in life tend to pale in comparison to the unrealistic euphoria of one’s imagination.
Brigantine is a small city in Atlantic County, New Jersey.

All eyes still on me
But I know somewhere you so proud of me, of me

Clouds broke, now it's raining on me
